page.title: 14LANGHAM SEWAGE FARM
page.content:
{ LANGHAM SEWAGE FARM}
One of the men that works in the sewage farm is called Mr.Rowe. The sewage farm was built in 1960. There are about Five people working there. Langham and Boxted Sewage goes to the Sewage farm. They have a lot of birds like Swifts and Sea gulls about, because they eat the grubs and larvae off of the stones in the sprinkler. The sewage works covers about one acre. It is manned for eight and a half hours each day. The employees do not live locally but travel from surrounding towns and villages. The pumps and the sprinkler are the most important equipment, and are maintained regularly.
